    * **To sow Discord:** They could be intentionally trying to create confusion and mistrust among us, hoping it will lead to accusations and eliminate innocent players.

Sarah says: The game has just started and I'm already thinking about how to gather information without arousing suspicion.

Derek mentioned that he's concerned about the number of new players in town and thinks we should investigate them first. That's a good point - it is suspicious that so many new people have arrived at once.

I also overheard Emma talking to Philip about how they're both "good guys" who want to get rid of the Mafia. But, I'm not sure if she's just trying to throw me off her scent or if she genuinely thinks we should work together.

Nick seems a bit too quiet and observant for my taste - he might be a Sheriff or something similar. But, at the same time, he could also be playing dumb to get more information out of us.

I'm not sure about Peter yet - I haven't seen him say much, but that doesn't necessarily mean anything. And George seems like a bit of a wild card - his behavior is erratic and unpredictable, which could either make him a good or bad guy.

Enrique seems calm and collected, which might actually be a good sign for the town if he's not Mafia. But, Maria seems overly defensive when someone mentions the possibility of her being Mafia... that could indicate guilt on her part.

Overall, I think my best bet is to try to gather more information from Derek and see if we can come up with some kind of plan together.
